column5: Wonder how thick the ice was where they went in ? stay safe this winter, looks like a roller coaster and I imagine trails/lakesÂ cld be hit or miss https://www.680news.com/2018/12/27/toronto-couple-killed-in-snowmobile-accident-on-boxing-day/
